name: One Run Dungeon
description:
Everything is a one hit kill - especially you.

One Run Dungeon is a side-scrolling platformer with one goal: beat the entire game in one run. Armed with just your spellbook and staff, you must defeat the countless hordes of beasts standing between you and the dungeon's master: The Necromancer.  

Inspired by classics such as Contra and Metal Slug, you must run and gun your way through a classical high fantasy dungeon. Fast-paced and challenging, only the most skilled and the most foolhardy can reach the dungeon end in one run.

Thank you for voting for us on Steam Greenlight!
